entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
